activities: Personal information of any type received by Alcatel-Lucent USA Inc. (at any of its locations including, but not limited to, Plano, Texas; Murray Hill, New Jersey and Naperville, Illinois) in the course of Alcatel-Lucent's business activities, including personally identifiable information related to current, former or prospective employees, customers, suppliers and contractors of companies in the Alcatel-Lucent and Nokia group of  companies, used for human resources related activities and otherwise to conduct business, manage customer and supplier relationships, comply with legal, regulatory and contractual requirements (including video and electronic monitoring of secure facilities) and (when acting as a processor) as directed by the applicable data controller.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: All personal data in any form including, but not limited to, organization, customer, visitor processed on-line, off-line, or manually, or by video or other
recoursemech: EU Data Protections Authorities and Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner
